name: heal-pulse
effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.

flavor_text.x_y: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
